title: Mac OS X 10.5.2 Install + Updates
description:
Contained in one .dmg archive:

* MacOSX 10.5 Retail 7GB DVDrip version: 9A581 (Burn to DL DVD)

* MacOSX 10.5.2 update (MacOSXUpdCombo10.5.2)

* Safari 3.1 Update (Safari31UpdLeo)

* QuickTime 7.4.5 Update (QuickTime745Leopard)

* QuickTime Pro Serial


Instructions:

1. Burn "Mac OS X 10.5 Install DVD 7GB.iso" to a double layer DVD.

2. Use DVD to install MacOSX 10.5 version: 9A581.

(I recommend always installing using  "Archive and Install" which saves your existing system files, user accounts, home folders, and existing network settings.) 

3. Once Leopard is up and running use "MacOSXUpdCombo10.5.2" to update to 10.5.2.

4. Update Safari "Safari31UpdLeo"

4. Update Quicktime "QuickTime745Leopard" and use supplied serial to make Pro version.


Enjoy!!!

Leopard is the most impressive Mac OS X version yet.
